mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_table_health_score(tid, score, time) VALUES (#{tid}, #{score}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT sys_table_health_score.score, sys_table_health_score.time FROM sys_table_health_score INNER JOIN(SELECT max(sys_table_health_score.time) AS max_time FROM sys_table_health_score WHERE tid = #{tid} GROUP BY date_format(sys_table_health_score.time, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS son ON sys_table_health_score.time = son.max_time WHERE tid = #{tid} ORDER BY sys_table_health_score.hid DESC limit 7
